Sentencas: In this study, anode supported micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) are fabricated by extrusion method and the effects of powder size, thickness and sintering temperature of the anode functional layer (AFL) on the electrochemical performance is experimentally investigated.
Titulo: Experimental investigation on the effect of anode functional layer on the performance of anode supported micro-tubular SOFCs

Sentencas: For this purpose, four different commercial NiO powders are tested as initial powder for the fabrication of the anode functional layer.
Titulo: Experimental investigation on the effect of anode functional layer on the performance of anode supported micro-tubular SOFCs

Sentencas: The thickness of AFL is also considered by varying the number of coatings.
Titulo: Experimental investigation on the effect of anode functional layer on the performance of anode supported micro-tubular SOFCs

Sentencas: After deciding the optimum initial NiO powder size used in AFL and AFL thickness, the effect of pre-sintering temperature is examined.
Titulo: Experimental investigation on the effect of anode functional layer on the performance of anode supported micro-tubular SOFCs

Sentencas: The performance tests are performed at an operating temperature of 800 degrees C under hydrogen and air.
Titulo: Experimental investigation on the effect of anode functional layer on the performance of anode supported micro-tubular SOFCs

Sentencas: The microstructures of the samples are also investigated by a scanning electron microscope.
Titulo: Experimental investigation on the effect of anode functional layer on the performance of anode supported micro-tubular SOFCs

Sentencas: The best peak power density is obtained as similar to 0.5 W/cm(2) from the cell having a single layer anode functional layer pre-sintered at 1250 degrees C prepared by NiO powders with 4 m(2)/g surface area.
Titulo: Experimental investigation on the effect of anode functional layer on the performance of anode supported micro-tubular SOFCs
